item.title: Building a Web Server on OpenFaaS
item.description: Building a Web Server on OpenFaaS Recently I’ve been playing around with OpenFaaS on Kubernetes and I’ve been looking for a small project to run on it. I’ve also wanted to start this static blog and figured this is a perfect project to run on OpenFaaS. Prerequisites Before we start make sure you have installed OpenFaaS on Kubernetes. This can be done in a few commands if you already have Helm installed.
